briefTitle: Predictors of Ovarian Insufficiency in Young Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: Predictors of Ovarian Insufficiency Through Serial Exams in Young Breast Cancer Patients (POISE Study)
conditions: Breast Cancer, Ovarian Insufficiency, Ovarian Failure
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Number of Participant Ovarian Insufficiency (Without of Menses for 12 Months) After Breast Cancer Diagnosis
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* New diagnosis of breast cancer (Stages 0-III)
* Age \<=45
* Premenopausal (at least one menses over past year)
* Has a uterus and at least one ovary

Exclusion Criteria:

* Prior chemotherapy
